TC.Description: This test case is designed to check that new 'Collection List' screen appears after click on Ok button at Allocation screen.
This test case is designed to check UI of new 'Collection List' screen.
This test case is designed to check the Functionality of 'Add' button available at new 'Collection List' screen.
This test case is designed to check the Functionality of checkboxes available at new 'Collection List' screen.
This test case is designed to check the 'Ok' button functionality at Collection list screen when only partially allocated collected items are available.
